subject: Track and Field
Doping (Sports)
Bribery and Kickbacks
Corruption (Institutional)
lead_paragraph: It can be difficult to find purity at the top of international sports. Despite corruption in track and field, Coe, the I.A.A.F. president, still may be the best option.
snippet: It can be difficult to find purity at the top of international sports. Despite corruption in track and field, Coe, the I.A.A.F. president, still may be the best option.
